title: Major League Cricket 2024 Full Preview - Squads, Predictions + Aussie Chat
body:
Major League Cricket 2024 Full Preview - Squads, Predictions + Aussie Chat | Cricket Today - Episode 87.

Cricket Today talk all things Major League Cricket, breaking down the squads, Aussies and star players from LA Knight Riders, MI New York, Seattle Orcas, San Francisco Unicorns, Texas Super Kings and Washington Freedom.

The panel go through their choices for player of the tournament and chat about an exciting MLC tournament ahead through banter, stats, chaos and debates!

Cricket Today host Liam 'Stats Guy' McAllion and experts Leo Mulally, Marcus Bazzano talk all things Major League Cricket 2024!

Timestamps:

Intro: 0:00

2023 MLC: 2:10

Teams: 3:50

Tournament Predictions: 21:00

Outro: 24:30
